name: Zieu D'La Mort
description:
In a dark and gloomy world, an eye tries to find its beloved skull among deadly traps and monsters...

Choose the direction of the ball with the commands : " 4-8-6-2" and "1-7-9-3 " which represents the arrows on your numeric keypad. Push the ball and increase the force by holding the "5" key (only the keys from the numeric keypad are supported.)

A little game made during a private one-day game jam, by 4 students :

  • Antoine Nisoli, Programmer
  • Antoine Cuviliez, Game Artist
  • Naomi Gaye, Game Artist
  • Clément Rigolli, Level Designer
